content.p: Hosted by the Chaplaincy team, this yearâ€™s annual Christmas Carol Service is an opportunity to join the university community in festive song. Our annual service of readings and familiar carols unfolding the Christmas story. Students and staff are involved in the programme through music, song, readings and hospitality. The event combines a wonderful mixture of traditional and contemporary Christmas songs. All who attend are also invited to enjoy mulled wine, mince pies and other seasonal refreshments following the service. This event will take place in St Marys in the Lace Market, High Pavement, Nottingham, NG1 1HN, on Thursday 5 December from 7pm. All donations for Nottingham Refugee Forum accepted.
